reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits well and appreciate its style, with one noting it's a perfect expensive-looking dress. The fabric receives positive feedback for being soft and forgiving, and customers like its color, with one describing it as a deep beautiful dark navy. Customers find the dress comfortable and flattering, particularly noting how it makes curves look nice, and appreciate the pockets. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretry, economical, comfy dress
items.body: Beautiful drape; soft, stretchy fabric; nice color; pockets, comofortable flattering fit, just right for this 74 yo 5'3" 180 lb woman. Wore it to an elegant Wicked-themed high tea. Machine washing it now in hopes I can change acessories and wear for Christmas. Read more
items.author: Mythmaryc

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must purchase!
items.body: I was very reluctant to make this order because my sizes fluctuate all over. I was measuring to compare to the sizes on the chart. I am so glad I did. I normally wear a 2x, but I went up a size to 3x just to make sure and because of those arms and bust areas... lol. It was a very good fit! So comfortable all over. The cleavage is not low, the pockets are awesome and deep, the material is light, airy, and soft, it drops right at my knees, looks good in the back, and all around. I would highly recommend this purchase. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful emerald green color dress
items.body: Beautiful dress! Heavier, weight, fabric, true size great emerald green color perfect for Christmas! Read more
items.author: Tricia

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars The black and white dress gets discolored
items.body: The dress fits well, is comfortable, and I get lots of compliments. However, the white part of the black and white swirls on the dress is gradually turning grey-green. Read more
items.author: Amelie Krikorian

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Style and Comfortable Dress
items.body: This is a great dress and I highly recommend it. I was looking for a nice comfortable dress I could wear to hide my tummy yet look stylish. The A-line of this dress is perfect and flowy. I wore it with boots and a scarf and was complimented many times at Thanksgiving. I'm 5'3, 175 lbs. and it drops to just below my knees. The material is not too thick or heavy yet feels substantial. Now I want it in other colors. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, beautiful and fits perfectly for many occasions.
items.body: This dress is amazing! It is so comfortable and looks beautiful! I wore it to a benefit fashion show one night dressed up and then a few days later I wore it to a funeral. I love the pockets on both sides! Love the material thickness. The flow of the dress and the length was perfect for me at 5’7”. Read more
items.author: K. Martin-Carter

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Dress Is Nice, But The Red Rubbed Off On Everything
items.body: Nice dress, it served its purpose. The red was pretty, but the color rubbed off on my white gloves and anything it touched. I did not see where it recommended washing first before wearing. Read more
items.author: Samuel Cambridge

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress
items.body: I bought this dress in yellow also after receiving this one. It fits nicely. The tapered waist with flared bottom will compliment a plus size shape. Read more
items.author: Patti

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, 002-black, Blue, Sage Green, Black Sakura, Black, Lucky Cloud Yellow, Navy Blue, Orange, Dark Green, Light Blue, Red, Rose Red, Blue Flower. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
